October 24, 1960
Dr. H. M. McLuhan
96 St. Joseph Street
Toronto 5, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshall:
Robin Harris delivered your note safely. Thanks for the excellent
column of Philâ€™s. Not aware of, or attending Columbus conference
October 26-29. Just phasing out here. But our Convention was a
real dandy.
See you sometime. Did you see Report on your Project? OK?
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skoraia
